com.arangodb.util

Interface ArangoSerialization

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ArangoDeserializer, ArangoSerializer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArangoJack, DefaultArangoSerialization
    Deprecated. 
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.

    @Deprecated
public interface ArangoSerialization
extends ArangoSerializer, ArangoDeserializer
    Author:
    Mark Vollmary
